issue.title: www.livingroomcandidate.org

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.livingroomcandidate.org/commercials/1980](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.livingroomcandidate.org%2Fcommercials%2F1980) ### Comment > Thumbnails for videos aren't loading on this site (any page). > Address sample https://www.livingroomcandidate.org/images/commercials/commercial_23755432da68_tiny.jpg - they are blocked by /commercials/* rule in AdGuard Russian filter, which seems like overkill. ``` Username: @DumpAndForget ``` ### Screenshots
